properties.areaDesc: Winnebago; McHenry; Lake; Ogle; Boone; Lee
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 2:50AM CST until February 13 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...Very Hazardous Travel Expected This Morning. Flash Freeze
Possible...

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches.

* WHERE...Winnebago, Boone, McHenry, Lake, Ogle, and Lee Counties.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will
impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will fall sharply behind an
arctic cold front which could also result in a flash freeze of
any lingering moisture on area roadways.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the
internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING
